brand_identity.name: Ralph's Roast (Internal Code Name)
brand_identity.visual_style: Ralph Lauren inspired: Dark wood, deep greens, brass accents, cream paper textures. Cinematic and moody.
brand_identity.tone_of_voice: Sophisticated, knowledgeable, intimate. Less 'Start your day', more 'Craft your legacy'.

primary.name: Polo Green
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, dark section backgrounds

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names. Letter-spacing: -0.02em.

layout_strategies.global: Use generous padding (p-12 to p-24). Avoid clutter. Every screen should feel like a magazine spread.
layout_strategies.hero_section: Full-screen immersive video or high-res image with overlay. Text aligned bottom-left or center with 'fade-up' animation.
layout_strategies.product_grid: Asymmetrical 'Masonry' or 'Bento' grid. Mix product cards with lifestyle images (people drinking coffee, beans texture).
layout_strategies.custom_builder: Split-screen layout. Left: Interactive controls (Sliders, Selectors). Right: Dynamic visual representation of the coffee bag/cup updating in real-time.

buttons.primary: Solid #1A2F23 background, #C5A059 text (on hover). Sharp corners or 2px radius. Uppercase text with wide tracking.
buttons.secondary: Transparent background, 1px solid #1A2F23 border. Dark text.
buttons.ghost: Text only with animated underline on hover.

cards.style: Flat, no shadow by default. 1px solid border in #E5E5E5 or transparent. On hover: subtle lift and border color change to #C5A059.
cards.content: Image takes up 70% of card height. Typography is centered or strictly left-aligned.

inputs.style: Underline only (border-b) or minimal box with #E5E5E5 border. Focus state: #1A2F23 border. Background: Transparent.

navigation.style: Sticky glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-md) with #1A2F23/90 background. White text. Gold accent on active link.

steps: 3. Grind Size (Visual icons: Fine, Medium, Coarse)
custom_builder.ui_note: Must feel tactile. Use sound effects (optional) or satisfying micro-interactions when selecting.

shipping_admin.note: Since shipping is manual, the Admin Dashboard needs a specific 'Logistics' tab where admin can set custom shipping rates per region or weight.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Playfair Display' from Google Fonts. Add import to index.css.
Implement the 'Custom Builder' as a priority feature. It is the USP.
Ensure the 'Admin Panel' has a dark mode option for the 'Logistics' tab.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. DO NOT use gray boxes.
For the 'Ralph Lauren' feel, use high contrast between the dark green and the cream/gold.
The 'My Muesli' inspiration means the builder must be highly granular. Allow mixing percentages if possible.

universal_guidelines.spacing: Use p-8, p-12, p-16. Don't be afraid of empty space.
universal_guidelines.animation: All hover states must have `transition-all duration-300 ease-out`. No instant changes.
universal_guidelines.border_radius: Keep it tight. `rounded-sm` or `rounded-md` max. No pill shapes unless for tags.
universal_guidelines.shadows: Use `shadow-lg` only for floating elements (modals, sticky headers). Cards should be flat.
